steps.title: Place 2 sticks together to form an X.
steps.content: Place 2 sticks together to form an X. This is the frame for the God's Eye.

steps.title: Diagonally wrap one side 4 times, then do the opposite side 4 times so it's secure.
steps.content: Diagonally wrap one side 4 times, then do the opposite side 4 times so it's secure.

steps.title: Hold the frame in one hand and keep the sticks in place.
steps.content: Hold the frame in one hand and keep the sticks in place.

steps.title: With the other hand, wrap the yarn over and around one arm of the X, then over and around the next arm, and so on.
steps.content: With the other hand, wrap the yarn over and around one arm of the X, then over and around the next arm, and so on. Pull the yarn tightly each time and push the yarn down snugly toward the center.

steps.title: Continue working this way until the God's Eye is completed.
steps.content: Continue working this way until the God's Eye is completed.

steps.title: Cut the yarn 3 inches (7.6 cm) from the end of the God's Eye.
steps.content: Cut the yarn 3 inches (7.6 cm) from the end of the God's Eye. Take a quilter's needle and tuck the end into the back of the God's Eye to secure.
